# Advanced Settings Payments Checkout

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/advanced-settings-payments-checkout/

## Category
03 Sales And Checkout

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
PAYMENTS
Advanced Settings: Payments & Checkout
IN THIS ARTICLE
Custom Payment Methods
Tip Buttons
Tip Options
Signature Options
Client Self Checkout
Check Payments
Change Calculator for Cash Payments
Receipt Preview
Require Staff Assignments
Receipt Settings

To adjust payment and checkout settings, open the Settings app and select Payments & Checkout > Advanced Settings.

Link copied
Custom Payment Methods

Add custom payment buttons to the checkout to track additional payment types like Venmo or PayPal in your reports. Separate each payment type with a comma.

Link copied
Tip Buttons

Customize the tip buttons on the Payments screen and Front Desk Display. Separate each tip amount with a comma.

Note: 

The tip percentage is based on services only (not products). For example, for a checkout with a $100 haircut and a $25 shampoo, if the client selects 20%, the tip would be $20.

Link copied
Tip Options

When enabled, clients will be asked for a tip when checking out at the Front Desk Display and during Self Checkout.

If tips are enabled for product-only sales, customers will need to enter a custom tip amount rather than select a tip percentage.

Link copied
Signature Options

When enabled, clients will be asked for a signature when checking out at the Front Desk Display. This setting is recommended as it can help you fight disputes.

Link copied
Client Self Checkout

Enable this toggle to allow clients to complete payments on their mobile devices. Clients will be sent a text message with a link to complete the payment, add a tip, and view their receipt. Learn more about Client Self Checkout.

Link copied
Check Payments

Enable this toggle to add a Check payment button to the checkout to accept checks as a form of payment.

Link copied
Change Calculator for Cash Payments

Enable this toggle to show a change calculator when taking cash payments.

Link copied
Receipt Preview

When enabled, a detailed receipt preview will display to clients when taking payments via the Front Desk Display and when taking cash payments.

Link copied
Require Staff Assignments

When enabled, a staff member must be assigned to the specified line items to complete a checkout. This setting is helpful if staff member compensation is commission-based or if you need to track which sales are completed by each staff member.

Link copied
Receipt Settings

Specify whether service providers should be displayed on the receipt, and add custom text that will be displayed at the bottom of the receipt.

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
